results.name: Number of integer triangles with an integer area having relatively prime sides a, b and c such that a + b + c = n.
comment: a(k) > 0 if and only if k is in A096468.
link: Peter Kagey, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Heronian Triangle.
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 05 2002
